qas.question: Which library is Columbia University's largest?
114th Street marks the southern boundary of which university's Morningside Heights Campus?
114th Street runs along which boundary of Columbia University's Morningside Heights Campus?

context: 114th Street marks the <a2_0>southern<a2_0/> boundary of <a1_0>Columbia University<a1_0/>’s Morningside Heights Campus and is the location of <a0_0>Butler Library<a0_0/>, which is the University’s largest.
